testcase.classname: F01_Registration |New User can create an account
testcase.name: Creating an account using valid data

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: users change currency to Euro
testcase.system-out: When user change currency to Euro...........................................passed Then currency changes to Euro...............................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_hoverCategories | hover over main categories and click on sub category
testcase.name: hover random over main categories and click on sub category
testcase.system-out: When user hover over random category........................................passed Then confirm the sub category title.........................................passed

testcase.name: User can add an item to the wishlist successfully

testcase.name: User can add an item to the wishlist successfully and check qty
